author: Cordeboeuf, Camille and Treille, Avril and Vilain, Coriandre and Sato, Marc
title: Le son de tes lèvres : corrélats électrophysiologiques de la perception audio-haptique de la parole. (The sound of your lips: electrophysiological correlates of audio-haptic speech perception) [in French]
booktitle: Proceedings of the Joint Conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2012, volume 1: JEP
